title: Little Mix have got the power in first look at Pretty Little Thing collection
text:
Little Mix have posed up for their first line with Pretty Little Thing (Picture: Pretty Little Thing)

The first image from Little Mix’s clothing collection with Pretty Little Thing has been released and we’ve died and gone to fashion heaven.

The girls were spotted shooting their new collection in Paris back in September, but with the official Pretty Little Thing Instagram sharing the pics, fans can get a glimpse of the collection for the first time.

Posing by the Eiffel Tower, the X Factor winning band look gorgeous (and slightly windswept) as they sport matching snake-skin print outfits that we just can’t get enough of.

The images see both Jesy Nelson and Leigh-Anne Pinnock go for a more natural toned snakeskin, with a flawless Jesy showing off her amazing abs in a bralet/cargo pants co-ord while Leigh-Anne wears an off-shoulder blazer with matching trousers, bag and shoes.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Now that’s a level of extra we truly aspire to.

The band have always loved a coordinating look (Picture: Getty)

For the other girls, bright colours are the order of the day, with Jade Thirwall pairing a strappy blue mini dress with a python print puffer jacket and backpack.

Meanwhile, Perrie Edwards looked punchy in pink as she sported a stunning strapless jumpsuit.

So if we wear one of these outfits, we’ll automatically look like Little Mix, right?

Little Mix’s collaboration with Manchester-based fashion juggernaut PLT will include plus sizes (hallelujah!) and will be launching on Thursday 7 November, which gives you a good three weeks to figure out how to save your paycheck and buy the lot.

And it seems like the girls are just as hyped as we are, with Perrie writing: ‘So f***ing excited! I can’t even deal’ on Instagram, while Jesy added: ‘You best be ready for this.’

Oh Jesy, we couldn’t be more ready!
